attributes.action: Sack all MP´s that have fraudulently clained expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In any othe walk of life these would have been:
a. Dismissed from their employment
b. Prosecuted.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament/relevant political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
